trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Redondo Beach
There was one other sighting in Redondo Beach on or around August 14th 2011
divs: Sighting Details It was metallic color, round, and stationary, in the sky. I called my friend over to take a look. He also said he saw it.
Summary: I was flying a kite at a park in Hermosa beach. I was watching the kite, looking East.
